name: LOLO
description:
There really isn’t much to say about LOLO. It is just another rhythm game, where you play as a goofy slime, with the mission to collect three golden eighth notes scattered in three different levels. Every level has different background music, with faster BPM as the player moves from one stage to another. Everything in the game world (and that includes you) moves to the beat of the soundtrack; the only thing you will be in control of is the slime’s direction. Sounds pretty easy, right?

Well.

It’s not. 

Controls: WFace forward.AFace left.SFace back.DFace right.PPause.EscExit. Sountrack:

LOLO's soundtrack was made by An, the Team's composer. You can find the HD version of the OST on her soundcloud page:

https://soundcloud.com/anwoodenskull/sets/lolost

Team:

This is Team Alpaca's second game, carried on by four out of the five original members (check our profile for more info). We hope you enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed making it!
